data.name: rocksdb_background_sync
data.type: turns on background syncs for rocksdb

data.name: rocksdb_blind_delete_primary_key
data.type: deleting rows by primary key lookup, without reading rows (blind deletes). blind delete is disabled if the table has secondary key.

data.name: rocksdb_bulk_load
data.type: use bulk-load mode for inserts. this disables unique_checks and enables rocksdb_commit_in_the_middle.

data.name: rocksdb_bulk_load_allow_unsorted
data.type: allow unsorted input during bulk-load. can be changed only when bulk load is disabled.

data.name: rocksdb_bulk_load_size
data.type: maximum number of records in a batch for bulk-load mode.

data.name: rocksdb_checksums_pct
data.type: percentage of rows to be checksummed.

data.name: rocksdb_collect_sst_properties
data.type: enables collecting sst file properties on each flush.

data.name: rocksdb_commit_in_the_middle
data.type: commit rows implicitly every rocksdb_bulk_load_size, on bulk load/insert, update and delete.

data.name: rocksdb_compaction_sequential_deletes
data.type: rocksdb will trigger compaction for the file if it has more than this number sequential deletes per window.

data.name: rocksdb_compaction_sequential_deletes_file_size
data.type: minimum file size required for compaction_sequential_deletes.

data.name: rocksdb_compaction_sequential_deletes_window
data.type: size of the window for counting rocksdb_compaction_sequential_deletes.

data.name: rocksdb_deadlock_detect_depth
data.type: number of transactions deadlock detection will traverse through before assuming deadlock.

data.name: rocksdb_debug_optimizer_no_zero_cardinality
data.type: if cardinality is zero, override it with some value.

data.name: rocksdb_debug_ttl_ignore_pk
data.type: for debugging purposes only. if true, compaction filtering will not occur on pk ttl data. this variable is a no-op in non-debug builds.

data.name: rocksdb_debug_ttl_read_filter_ts
data.type: for debugging purposes only.  overrides the ttl read filtering time to time + debug_ttl_read_filter_ts. a value of 0 denotes that the variable is not set. this variable is a no-op in non-debug builds.

data.name: rocksdb_debug_ttl_rec_ts
data.type: for debugging purposes only.  overrides the ttl of records to now() + debug_ttl_rec_ts. the value can be +/- to simulate a record inserted in the past vs a record inserted in the 'future'. a value of 0 denotes that the variable is not set. this variable is a no-op in non-debug builds.

data.name: rocksdb_debug_ttl_snapshot_ts
data.type: for debugging purposes only. sets the snapshot during compaction to now() + debug_set_ttl_snapshot_ts. the value can be positive or negative to simulate a snapshot in the past vs a snapshot created in the 'future'. a value of 0 denotes that the variable is not set. this variable is a no-op in non-debug builds.

data.name: rocksdb_enable_2pc
data.type: enable two phase commit for myrocks. when set, myrocks will keep its data consistent with the

data.name: rocksdb_enable_bulk_load_api
data.type: enables using sstfilewriter for bulk loading.

data.name: rocksdb_enable_ttl
data.type: enable expired ttl records to be dropped during compaction.

data.name: rocksdb_enable_ttl_read_filtering
data.type: for tables with ttl, expired records are skipped/filtered out during processing and in query results. disabling this will allow these records to be seen, but as a result rows may disappear in the middle of transactions as they are dropped during compaction. use with caution.

data.name: rocksdb_flush_log_at_trx_commit
data.type: sync on transaction commit. similar to

data.name: rocksdb_flush_memtable_on_analyze
data.type: forces memtable flush on analzye table to get accurate cardinality.

data.name: rocksdb_force_compute_memtable_stats
data.type: force to always compute memtable stats.

data.name: rocksdb_force_compute_memtable_stats_cachetime
data.type: time in usecs to cache memtable estimates.

data.name: rocksdb_force_flush_memtable_and_lzero_now
data.type: acts similar to force_flush_memtable_now, but also compacts all l0 files.

data.name: rocksdb_force_flush_memtable_now
data.type: forces memstore flush which may block all write requests so be careful.

data.name: rocksdb_force_index_records_in_range
data.type: used to override the result of records_in_range() when force index is used.

data.name: rocksdb_git_hash
data.type: git revision of the rocksdb library used by myrocks.

data.name: rocksdb_info_log_level
data.type: filter level for info logs to be written mysqld error log. valid values include 'debug_level', 'info_level', 'warn_level''error_level' and 'fatal_level'.

data.name: rocksdb_large_prefix
data.type: support large index prefix length of 3072 bytes. if off, the maximum index prefix length is 767.

data.name: rocksdb_lock_scanned_rows
data.type: take and hold locks on rows that are scanned but not updated.

data.name: rocksdb_lock_wait_timeout
data.type: number of seconds to wait for lock.

data.name: rocksdb_master_skip_tx_api
data.type: skipping holding any lock on row access. not effective on slave.

data.name: rocksdb_max_latest_deadlocks
data.type: maximum number of recent deadlocks to store.

data.name: rocksdb_max_row_locks
data.type: maximum number of locks a transaction can have.

data.name: rocksdb_merge_buf_size
data.type: size to allocate for merge sort buffers written out to disk during inplace index creation.

data.name: rocksdb_merge_combine_read_size
data.type: size that we have to work with during combine (reading from disk) phase of external sort during fast index creation.

data.name: rocksdb_merge_tmp_file_removal_delay_ms
data.type: fast index creation creates a large tmp file on disk during index creation.  removing this large file all at once when index creation is complete can cause trim stalls on flash. this variable specifies a duration to sleep (in milliseconds) between calling chsize() to truncate the file in chunks. the chunk size is  the same as merge_buf_size.

data.name: rocksdb_override_cf_options
data.type: option overrides per cf for rocksdb.

data.name: rocksdb_perf_context_level
data.type: perf context level for rocksdb internal timer stat collection.

data.name: rocksdb_persistent_cache_size_mb
data.type: size of cache in mb for blockbasedtableoptions::persistent_cache for rocksdb.

data.name: rocksdb_print_snapshot_conflict_queries
data.type: logging queries that got snapshot conflict errors into *.err log.

data.name: rocksdb_read_free_rpl_tables
data.type: list of tables that will use read-free replication on the slave (i.e. not lookup a row during replication).

data.name: rocksdb_records_in_range
data.type: used to override the result of records_in_range(). set to a positive number to override.

data.name: rocksdb_reset_stats
data.type: reset the rocksdb internal statistics without restarting the db.

data.name: rocksdb_seconds_between_stat_computes
data.type: sets a number of seconds to wait between optimizer stats recomputation. only changed indexes will be refreshed.

data.name: rocksdb_skip_bloom_filter_on_read
data.type: skip using bloom filter for reads.

data.name: rocksdb_skip_fill_cache
data.type: skip filling block cache on read requests.

data.name: rocksdb_skip_unique_check_tables
data.type: skip unique constraint checking for the specified tables.

data.name: rocksdb_store_row_debug_checksums
data.type: include checksums when writing index/table records.

data.name: rocksdb_strict_collation_check
data.type: enforce case sensitive collation for myrocks indexes.

data.name: rocksdb_strict_collation_exceptions
data.type: list of tables (using regex) that are excluded from the case sensitive collation enforcement.

data.name: rocksdb_table_stats_sampling_pct
data.type: percentage of entries to sample when collecting statistics about table properties. specify either 0 to sample everything or percentage [1..100]. by default 10% of entries are sampled.

data.name: rocksdb_tmpdir
data.type: directory for temporary files during ddl operations.

data.name: rocksdb_trace_sst_api
data.type: generate trace output in the log for each call to the sstfilewriter.

data.name: rocksdb_unsafe_for_binlog
data.type: allowing statement based binary logging which may break consistency.

data.name: rocksdb_update_cf_options
data.type: option updates per column family for rocksdb.

data.name: rocksdb_use_clock_cache
data.type: use clockcache instead of default lrucache for rocksdb.

data.name: rocksdb_validate_tables
data.type: verify all .frm files match all rocksdb tables (0 means no verification, 1 means verify and fail on error, and 2 means verify but continue.

data.name: rocksdb_verify_row_debug_checksums
data.type: verify checksums when reading index/table records.

data.name: rocksdb_wal_recovery_mode
data.type: dboptions::wal_recovery_mode for rocksdb. default is kabsoluteconsistency.

data.name: rocksdb_write_batch_max_bytes
data.type: maximum size of write batch in bytes. 0 means no limit.
